sulfurous.description: It has this overwhelming sulfurous smell, like burnt stone and brimstone hanging thick in your nose.

floral.description: It has this sweet, loving floral smell, unnaturally sweet and out of place in this dark place.

metallic.description: It has this lingering metallic smell, sharp and cold, like blood on iron.

musty.description: It has this overwhelming musty smell, thick with age and the weight of forgotten dust.

rotting.description: It has this lingering of rot smell, like flesh and wood left too long in the dark.

sweet.description: It has such a sweet smell, sickly and cloying, like overripe fruit gone wrong.

ozone.description: It smells of ozone, crackling and charged, like a lightning storm sealed in stone.

mossy.description: It has this overwhelming mossy smell, damp and earthy, like deep forest groves reclaimed by time.

parchment.description: Old parchment and ink is the predominant smell, like an old library long abandonned, fragile knowledge long entombed.

blood.description: It has this pungent smell of blood, fresh and warm, as if something just died nearby.
